definition: lit. even a prairie fire cannot destroy the grass - it grows again when the breeze blows (proverb)/fig. cannot be easily eliminated/abbr. to 野火春風|野火春风[ye3 huo3 chun1 feng1]
pinyin: ye3 huo3 shao1 bu4 jin4 , chun1 feng1 chui1 you4 sheng1
simplified: 野火烧不尽，春风吹又生
word: 野火燒不盡，春風吹又生

definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
